string.text: Product No. 62: Find the documentation in the test shop
I need to find documentation on Product number 62. The documentation should confirm whether or not that weapon caused the crash.
Mysterious Weapons: Take cover inside the building
We need to hide in the building and repel the Monolith attack.
Mysterious Weapons: Get information
The weapon malfunctioned, but it's not clear how it works. I need to find information that will help me restore it to working order.
Mysterious Weapons: Kill the Monolith Preacher
I have to kill the Monolith commander/preacher, who is armed with the unknown rifle.
Mysterious Weapons: Search the bodies
I need to check the Monolithans, they might be carrying the weapon we are after.
Mysterious Weapons: Talk to Cardan
Cardan must've woken up by now. Time to talk him about this weapon.
Mysterious Weapons: Wait for Cardan to wake up
It seems Cardan knows something about this weapon. I'll have to talk to him when he wakes up.
Gauss Cannon: Tell Kowalski about the weapon
I must brief Colonel Kowalski on all the information I've gathered on Product number 62.
Mysterious Weapons: Hook up with the squad
I have to assist a special squad and conduct a joint operation to seize the unknown weapon weapon.
Mysterious Weapons: Retrieve the rifle from the Preacher
I need to retrieve the Preacher's rifle.
Mysterious Weapons: Show the weapon to Kowalski
I have the weapon, time to show it to Kowalski and find out whether it caused the helicopter crash.
Mysterious Weapons: Assist in ambushing the Monolith squad
A military recon team is organizing an ambush for a Monolith squad. I should take part in this operation.
Shattering The Monolith: Meet the reinforcements
Kowalski sent reinforcements to help destroy the Monolith squad entrenched at the bookstore.
Shattering The Monolith: Sweep the bookstore
We have to kill all Monolith fighters entrenched inside the building. This camp represents a clear threat to the military safehouse.
Shattering The Monolith: Investigate the idol
Inside the building, we found a strange contraption. I need to examine this structure.
X8 Lab: Find documentation on the experiments
All gathered information points to a central laboratory designated X8. It may hold information about secret experiments conducted within the Zone.
Failed Recon: Locate the squad
A recon team sent out by Kowalski dropped from the radar after sending a strange message. I need to find them and find out what happened.
Missing Watchman: Inspect the body
The soldier behaved very strangely before shooting himself, I should look around and find the cause of his strange behaviour.
Missing Watchman: Find the sentry
One of the soldiers disappeared from his post, I need to find him and find out why did he abandon his duty.
Missing Watchman: Kill the Controller
There's a controller near the missing sentry, time to kill him.
Interference: Find the missing squad
A squad looking for the source of the interference has disappeared, I need to find it.
Interference: Search the dead soldiers
I have to inspect the bodies, maybe it will help me to identify the cause of their deaths.
Interference: Search the body of the deceased soldier
I have to inspect the body, perhaps it will help me establish the cause of his death.
Interference: Blow up the door
To enter the building, I need to place the explosives, and clear the way inside.
Interference: Check the source of the knocking
I can hear knocking come from the freezer, as if someone was locked inside. I have to check it.
Interference: Destroy the source of interference
I've found the jammer, time to wreck it.
Interference: Find the source of interference
Somewhere in this building is the source of interference, I need to find it.
Interference: Find the explosives
The squad that was looking for the source of interference also carried explosives. I need to find them, so that I can clear the entrance to the building.
Interference: Enter the kindergarten
The source of the jamming signal is located somewhere in the kindergarten, I have to recon the building.
Evacuation: Cover the soldiers
Despite the fact that Strelok was killed, I need to help the military reach the helicopters.
Evacuation: Cover Strelok
Command is interested in Strelok's information. I am ordered to deliver Strelok to the helicopters.
Evacuation: Get to the helicopters
My entire team was killed, I need to reach the helicopters alone.
Evacuation: Talk to Kowalski
I must talk to Kowalski before the evacuation.
Evacuation: Tell Kowalski when you're ready to go
The evacuation will start when I tell Kowalski that I'm ready.
Evacuation: Wait until the emission ends
I need to wait out the emission.
Unknown: Check the signal source
Kirilov picked up a strange signal near the base. It is necessary to verify its source.
Unknown: Follow the signal
Coordinates of the unknown signal are once again available for me to track.
Unknown: Explore the last location of the signal
The signal disappeared in the courtyard of the dormitories, I have to examine the location.
Unknown: Prepare for an attack on the base
I have to return to our base and prepare for a probable attack.
Interference: Talk to Kowalski
Colonel Kowalski asked me to come to him, he wants to talk.
X8 Lab: Find the elevator shaft
Under the Jubilee Palace of Arts lies the underground lab I need to get into. The only access point is through an elevator shaft.
X8 Lab: Find the generator
The elevator door is not powered. To open them, I must find and turn on the emergency generator.
X8 Lab: Down to the lab
I must take the elevator down to the X8 lab, located under the building of the Jubilee Palace of Arts.
One Shot: Eliminate the representative
I have to assassinate the representative. Without him, the mercenaries will not be able to find the laboratory.
One Shot: Wait for the client's men
I must wait for the client's representatives and eliminate their boss. Without him, the mercenaries will not be able to find the laboratory.
One Shot: Eliminate the mercenary commander
I need to eliminate the leader of the mercenaries. Without him, the mercenaries will be disorganized and no longer a threat.
One Shot: Wait for the mercenaries
I must wait for the appearance of the mercenaries and eliminate their leader. Without him, the mercenaries will be disorganized and no longer a threat.
One shot: Talk to Kowalski
I have to debrief Kowalski on the results of the operation.
X8 Lab: Leave the underground complex or continue to search for documents
I have found a document in the complex. However, more documents may remain within the complex.
X8 Lab: Leave the underground complex or continue to search for documents
I have found several documents in the complex, should be enough. However, more documents may remain within the complex.
X8 Lab: Leave the underground complex
Apparently, I've collected all of the documentation. I can leave the underground complex now.
Shattering The Monolith: Wait for backup
I need to wait for reinforcements sent by Kowalski to eliminate all Monolith members in the bookstore
Face To Face: Talk to Kowalski
I need to talk to Kowalski. Apparently, he wants to tell me something important.
Evacuation: Protect the helicopters
It's necessary to protect the helicopters from the advancing enemy until it can take off.
Evacuation: Knock some sense into the medic
It seems the medic has come again under that strange influence. I have to help him.
Evacuation: Return to the helicopters
I have to get back to the helicopters, so that we can get out of here.
Evacuation: Immediately return to the helicopters
The helicopters are ready to go. I need to get on board, as the pilots will not wait too long.
